title: OnePlus 10 Pro now supports Verizon 5G, including C-Band
content:
The OnePlus 10 Pro was just released outside of China, and like all recent OnePlus devices, it’s certified to work on Verizon’s cellular network. However, the phone still couldn’t connect to Verizon’s 5G services, which has now been fixed â€“ just in time for the OnePlus 10 Pro’s release date in the United States. OnePlus

The post OnePlus 10 Pro now supports Verizon 5G, including C-Band appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The OnePlus 10 Pro has been certified to work on Verizon's C-Band 5G, but not the company's limited mmWave 5G network.
